name: Tartle's Flying Chair Illusion
description:
In this hyper realistic simulator, you play as an unsung hero flying from somewhere to somewhere else on a flight that takes three hours. Gather your wits, your courage, and ensure your luggage is stowed in the overhead compartment. Get ready to

STAY IN YOUR SEAT!

Warning: This game contains serious airplane action. 

Featuring original music composed by the Tartle Wizard.
